lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Under Canadian guidlines, loans are classified as non-accrual when there are indications the bank will lose interest or principal on the loan or when it believes it will be difficult to fully settle the account within a reasonable period.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: "There are strong indications that financial services are being bargained away in the current free trade negotiations between Canada and the United States with no requirement of full reciprocity," Fullerton said.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Fullerton also said Canadian Imperial still plans to enter the brokerage business this year after the federal government introduces laws that will let banks expand their actitivities.
